mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'MM-DD') AS label, SUM(SALES_PRICE * QUANTITY) AS sales, SUM(PROFIT) AS profit FROM COMMODITY_MANAGEMENT.PROFIT WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND SALES_DATE >= #{startDate} AND SALES_DATE <= #{endDate} AND DELETED_FLG = '0' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'MM-DD') ORDER BY label
